conversion_verification.notes: True 3D transformation confirmed with visible wall depth and isometric projection.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Strong 3D volume and wall geometry; perspective is clear and consistent.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Excellent fidelity to room configuration, partitions, and wall placement.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture placement matches the 2D layout perfectly, including bathroom fixtures and laundry appliances.

visual_clarity.notes: High clarity, minimal artifacts, though slightly dark rendering.

detected_errors.description: Laundry door orientation differs slightly from plan arc.

summary: An exceptionally faithful and geometrically accurate 3D translation that preserves every architectural detail of the source floor plan.
